content.text:
The Fabric Zoning Send (FZS) command is used to send a Zoning data structure. The FZS command uses
the Data Pointer, Command Dword 10, Command Dword 11, and Command Dword 12 fields, as shown in
Figure 545, Figure 546, Figure 547, and Figure 548 respectively.

figures.detected_title: Figure 545: Fabric Zoning Send (FZS) – Data Pointer
figures.title: Figure 545: Fabric Zoning Send (FZS) – Data Pointer

figures.detected_title: Figure 546: Fabric Zoning Send (FZS) – Command Dword 10
figures.title: Figure 546: Fabric Zoning Send (FZS) – Command Dword 10

figures.detected_title: Figure 547: Fabric Zoning Send (FZS) – Command Dword 11
figures.title: Figure 547: Fabric Zoning Send (FZS) – Command Dword 11

figures.detected_title: Figure 548: Fabric Zoning Send (FZS) – Command Dword 12
figures.title: Figure 548: Fabric Zoning Send (FZS) – Command Dword 12
